gsm.qc: Good Statistical Monitoring Testing Suite

Source: R/gsm.qc-package.R
gsm.qc-package.Rd

The Good Statistical Monitoring or 'gsm' R packages provides a framework for statistical data monitoring. This package provides all a testing suite for all the packages involved.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/Gilead-BioStats/gsm.qc

  • https://gilead-biostats.github.io/gsm.qc

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/Gilead-BioStats/gsm.qc/issues
